description:
Sakurai asks Uzaki to join him cuddling friendly felines at a cat café. Uzaki asks Sakurai to accompany her to a pub for drinks on her 20th birthday.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Want to Hang Out at a Cat Cafe and a Pub!
Neko Cafe to Izakaya de Asobitai!
أريد أن أتسكع في مقهى القطط وفي الحانة!
猫カフェと居酒屋で遊びたい!
